meanings.definition: Very good of its kind; outstanding.
meanings.sent1: The cake was excellent, everyone loved it.
meanings.sent2: She received an excellent grade on her test.
meanings.sent3: The excellent weather made the picnic even more enjoyable.
meanings.sent4: His excellent skills in painting were admired by all.
meanings.sent5: The excellent view from the top of the mountain took her breath away.

meanings.sent1: The movie received excellent reviews from critics.
meanings.sent2: The team's performance was excellent throughout the season.
meanings.sent3: The excellent timing of the joke made everyone burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: Her excellent memory was like a superpower during exams.
meanings.sent5: The excellent service at the restaurant made the dining experience unforgettable.

meanings.sent1: The hotel provided excellent customer service to all guests.
meanings.sent2: His excellent leadership skills helped the team succeed.
meanings.sent3: The excellent quality of the fabric made the dress look stunning.
meanings.sent4: The excellent taste of the dish left everyone wanting more.
meanings.sent5: The excellent performance of the orchestra left the audience in awe.
